definition: abbr. for 外商獨資企業|外商独资企业[wai4 shang1 du2 zi1 qi3 ye4]

sentences.english: In your opinion, what is the future of the foreign-funded bank in China?
sentences.chinese: 你认为外资银行今后在中国的发展前景如何？

sentences.english: In the perspective of time series, shares of foreign investment in most subordinate industry fluctuate remarkably.
sentences.chinese: 从时间趋势看，多数行业中外资份额呈明显波动状态。

sentences.english: The fact is that China has good performance and high potential in attracting FDI.
sentences.chinese: 中国在吸收外资方面，不仅业绩显著，而且具有潜力。

sentences.english: Stanely:Maybe if there are more foreign investments, there will be more regulations to protect foreign investors.
sentences.chinese: 我想或许外资一多，就会有规范来保障外商吧。

sentences.english: Thailand now also tops the list of Laos’ foreign investors.
sentences.chinese: 泰国现在也是老挝最大的外资投资方之一。

sentences.english: Municipality public utility enterprises are responsible for proposing the enterprises' projects of utilizing foreign capital.
sentences.chinese: 城市市政公用企业负责提出本企业的利用外资项目。

sentences.english: We will promote the coordinated development of overseas Chinese investment and the utilization of foreign capital in China.
sentences.chinese: 推动对外投资和利用外资协调发展。

sentences.english: For projects using foreign loans, special provisions set by lenders shall be complied with.
sentences.chinese: 利用外资项目，如国外贷款方有特殊规定，从其规定。

sentences.english: A report by Jiangxi Economic and Trade Department also shows the trend of an emulative inrushing of foreign investment.
sentences.chinese: 江西省经贸厅一份报告也显示了外资争相涌入的趋势。

sentences.english: How can a Chinese name of a new WFOE be chosen?
sentences.chinese: 如何选择新的外资公司的中文名称？

sentences.english: Efforts should be made to expand export and use foreign capital actively and efficiently.
sentences.chinese: 要努力扩大出口，积极有效利用外资。

sentences.english: In western region, the growth rate of absorption of foreign investment accelerated.
sentences.chinese: 西部地区吸收外资增速加快。

sentences.english: The builders themselves have built their companies with successful initial public offerings and by attracting foreign investment.
sentences.chinese: 建筑商通过成功上市并吸引外资，锻造了自己的实力。

sentences.english: Foreign banks boost expansion in China in post-crisis era.
sentences.chinese: 后经济危机时代，外资银行在中国的业务将迅速扩张。

sentences.english: China will actively attract foreign investment in reorganizing and transforming SOEs.
sentences.chinese: 中国将积极吸收外资参与国有企业改组改造。

sentences.english: Foreign - funded enterprises over the past few days have been close-out cigarettes on the deal.
sentences.chinese: 连日来外资企业已纷纷对香烟进行清仓处理。

definition: abbr. for 外商獨資企業|外商独资企业[wai4 shang1 du2 zi1 qi3 ye4]

pinyin: wai4 shang1 zhi2 jie1 tou2 zi1

definition: hot money, money flowing from one currency to another in the hope of quick profit
centrally-managed state-owned enterprise (PRC), abbr. for 中央企業|中央企业[zhong1 yang1 qi3 ye4]
to dump (selling abroad more cheaply than cost price at home)
merger and acquisition (M and A)/acquisition/to take over
